name: RI_1_1_3_Transform_Translate_Record_Lifecycle_Event
title: RI.1.1.3 Transform/Translate Record Lifecycle Event (Function)
description: Transform/Translate Record Entries (1 or more instances)
purpose:
Occurs when an agent causes the system to change the form, language or code system used to represent record entry content. 

Reference: ISO 21089-2018, Section 15.3.

statement.label: RI.1.1.3#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to render coded Record Entry content translated from one coding/classification system to another.

statement.label: RI.1.1.3#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to render coded Record Entry content translated from one value set to another.

statement.label: RI.1.1.3#03
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability to render Record Entry content translated from one human language to another.

statement.label: RI.1.1.3#04
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD maintain the original and all previously amended versions of the Record Entry, retaining each version instance without alteration.

statement.label: RI.1.1.3#05
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture a new uniquely identifiable version of the Record Entry, incorporating translated content.
